full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN DAM PA SKU 'PHRENG BZHI PA'I ZHAL SNGA NAS GSUNG BA'I LUNG BSTAN GSAL BA'I RNAM THAR YID BZHIN DBANG RGYAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,SKYABS MGON BDAG NYID SKU 'PHRENG BZHI PA YI, ,THUGS RJE RGYA MTSO LAS 'ONG SKAL LDAN RNAMS, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN LA GTZANG SPRAS BYED PA'I TSUL, ,ZHIB TU GSAL BA'I LUNG BSTAN SOGS YIG 'DI, ,SKYABS MCHOG DAM PA SKU 'PHRENG BRGYAD PA YIS, ,BOD KYI NGAG TU BSGYUR ZHES GSUNG BZHIN DU, ,GSUNG BCAG MI SHES NYAMS CHUNG SU MA TI, ,WA G'INDRA AARTHA SIDDHI'I MING, ,'DI BRIS DGE BA'I BSOD NAMS 'DI YI MTHU, ,'DI NAS SHI 'PHOS GYUR MA THAG TU NI, ,'DI MTSON RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I PHUNG PO RNAMS, ,'DI LA RTEN NAS BYANG PHYOGS SHAMBHA LAR, ,NGES PAR SKYES NAS RIGS LDAN CHOS KYI RGYAL, ,RJES SU BZUNG NAS MTHONG THOS DRAN REG GI ,'BREL TSANG DON LDAN LDAN PA'I SKYES BU RNAMS, ,SKU GSUM GO 'PHANG MYUR DU THOB PAR SHOG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,
author_simple: SU MA TI WA GINDRA AARTHA SIDDHI'I MING,
